Class ProcessMoney

java.lang.Object
  ProcessMoney

public class ProcessMoney
extends java.lang.Object

Deal with processing money entered by a customer to purchase tickets.

Constructor Summary
ProcessMoney()
           
 
Method Summary
 void add(int coin)
          Add a coin with value 'coin' in pence to the ticket machine to 'partial' pay for the ticket.
 void bought()
          The ticket has been bought, and money entered by the user is added to the total money in the machine
 void cancel()
          Cancel the purchase of the ticket.
 boolean enough()
          Return true if sufficent money has been entered to buy the ticket else return false
 int getNumCoins(int coin)
          Deliver how many 'coins' are in the machine.
 int getPaidSoFar()
          Return the value in pence paid so far into the machine for a ticket
 int getTicketPrice()
          Return the price in pence of the current ticket
 int moneyInMachine()
          Deliver in pence the total amount of money in the machine that has been used to purchase tickets.
 void setTicketPrice(int amount)
          Set the price for the current ticket

Constructor Detail

ProcessMoney

public ProcessMoney()
Method Detail

add

public void add(int coin)
Add a coin with value 'coin' in pence to the ticket machine to 'partial' pay for the ticket.

Parameters:
coin - The coin to add to the ticket machine

bought

public void bought()
The ticket has been bought, and money entered by the user is added to the total money in the machine

cancel

public void cancel()
Cancel the purchase of the ticket. 'Coins' are returned to the customer. The amount credited so far is set to zero.

enough

public boolean enough()
Return true if sufficent money has been entered to buy the ticket else return false

Returns:
true if sufficient money else false

getNumCoins

public int getNumCoins(int coin)
Deliver how many 'coins' are in the machine. Thus if there were 63 10p coins getNumCoins( 10 ) would return 63.

Parameters:
coin - The coin selected
Returns:
Total number of 'coin'p coins in the machine.

getPaidSoFar

public int getPaidSoFar()
Return the value in pence paid so far into the machine for a ticket

Returns:
In pence the amount paid so far

getTicketPrice

public int getTicketPrice()
Return the price in pence of the current ticket

Returns:
Cost of ticket in pence

moneyInMachine

public int moneyInMachine()
Deliver in pence the total amount of money in the machine that has been used to purchase tickets.

Returns:
The total money in the machine in pence.

setTicketPrice

public void setTicketPrice(int amount)
Set the price for the current ticket

Parameters:
amount - Cost of ticket in pence
